name: Metroid + Saving
description:
This hack replaces Metroid’s password system with a saving system, offering three save files. The file selection menu shows the player’s equipment, and as an added bonus, the player’s health is now saved (no need to grind for health every time you resume your game). The save system can be a handy addition for those who don’t like to use save-states, or those playing on a flash-cart.

Included is a scrollable map when the game is paused and the ability to combine wave and ice beams.

Version 0.3 fixes a bug that could prevent the game from booting correctly in some cases. The hack has been tested and confirmed to work on the PowerPak as well as a normal cart.

name: See The Sky
description:
See the sky is one such story book, a festive-themed Christmas present released for Apple Macintosh in 1992 as a series of HyperCard stacks. In 1996 it was re-released in a remastered form: as an interactive CD-ROM, produced using Macromedia Director, which added ambient music and navigation to the original images. Also released in 1996 was a printed book of the story, presented as 3 images per page. Finally, in 1999 a CD-R of the combined HyperCard stacks was released.

This is a new version of "See the sky" for Playdate, which adds chapter navigation similar to the CD-ROM version.

description: Explore the unknown procedurally-generated world of islands and seas. Fight enemies, farm materials, craft equipment, build your base, slay bosses and level up your character. Conquer the unknown with your friends.

name: Behind the Kingdom
description: A nonlinear exploration / action game with a huge, seamless & interconnected map, tons of movement upgrades + character customizations, and vibrant pixel art.

name: Game Cafe
description: Game Cafe is a casual game where you can play games like Spades, Okey, Backgammon and more with your friends or other cross platform players.

name: Cluaido
description: A procedural mystery game where you play as the detective to solve a murder case. Find hidden clues, solve logical puzzles and freely interrogate the suspects in a game populated with AI characters who'll answer dynamically to your questions.

name: Project 1942
description: Project 1942: Dive into World War II with intense land, sea, and air battles. Teamwork is key in conquest mode. A nostalgic throwback to classic war games.

name: Sime is Back
description: Sime's back, celebrated by locals but tired of exploitation. Join him & his feline friend on a whimsical Adriatic journey. Armed with his fish, Sime confronts enemies, smashes crates & reclaims what's his. Dive into this charming adventure of chaos, camaraderie, & fish-flinging fun!

name: Run Away From Me. Alexandra
description: An action-packed adventure quest with horror elements about Alexandra, who fell into the clutches of a maniac. Your task is to escape from him, completing quests along the way. What ending will you have? Can you choose from the maniac's lair? And who is the real victim in this story?

name: Primordial Nation
description: Embark on a journey to explore & expand your primordial nation through the ages. Lead it to exploit & exterminate against those who oppose you. This 4X grand strategy game blends immersive city-building & management with dynamic RTS elements.

name: Mythic Crusade
description: Explore, gain resources, expand your town, recruit armies, fight infidels, find new spells, learn skills, and find powerful artifacts. Create your unique build and reclaim the Mythic Holy Land.

name: Dark Dive
description: You're a "willing" employee, that got send down into the lower levels to capture the escaped monsters. Proceed through the random generated levels, gather items and find the monster. Good luck surviving!

name: We Need Space
description: A romantic comedy visual novel with a sci-fi tilt. If you've ever wanted to blast someone into space, this may very well be for you.

name: Grapplers: Relic Rivals
description: Engage in fast-paced local PvP matches while unearthing ancient relics and harnessing their power to conquer your rivals. Dodge deadly traps, utilize your grappling hook, activate mystical runes, and master each relic to defeat your opponents and reign victorious in this thrilling PvP platformer!

name: Not Alone
description: Not Alone is a first-person mystical horror game where you need to escape from a terrifying house. This house may look familiar to some, but that's only at first glance. Read the notes to understand what happened and search for ways to escape.

name: Cafè Manager
description: Design your dream cafe, manage staff, serve a variety of coffees and desserts, and grow your business. Are you ready to brew your way to success?

name: Cyberpunk Horror
description: Cyberpunk Horror - is a first-person horror game that conveys a real atmosphere of horror in a cyberpunk setting.

name: Odd Eye
description: Two different worlds from different colored eyes.

name: Tower of Mask
description: Survival horror RPG where new terrors await! This game inherits the charm of 1980s dungeon RPGs. Step into the mysterious deep tower where bizarre masked humans roam!

name: Salvation of Sisyphus
description: In this high-stakes, foddian platformer you can finally find out if Sisyphus is happy after all. Equipped with only your pet rock, suffer trials and tribulations - come out a changed person. Join Sisyphus on his journey to salvation and reach the top together! What awaits him there is incredible...

name: Unable to Exit 8
description: You receive an invitation on a "special" dating app. After getting excited, you get involved in an infinite loop in a couple's hotel. You must carefully observe all the anomalies, and the answer to the mystery is waiting for you on the 30th floor.

name: Gravewatch
description: Dive into one of the scariest experiences you will ever get to play! In this horror game, you will get to play as Daniel, a desperate man trying to support his ill daughter by stealing from the dead... however, this time, Daniel will experience hell on earth, as things don't go according to plan...

name: Roaches: The Birthday Party
description: Game includes 7 funny roach birthday party pictures as puzzles. Each puzzle is available as 25, 49 or 100 pieces. There is no time limit, reference image is always available during assembling. Take your time, enjoy assembling and have a fun with roach party pictures!

name: Hop Man
description: Are you sick of walking? Do better and just jump. Go on a Castle adventure in Hop Man with your pals! You must overcome the traps by yourself to see what lies behind them, but keep in mind that there are no shortcuts to the castle.

name: Incident Survival
description: Role-playing board game. Your fate is in your own hands. Join together with others who want to test their abilities in a challenging situation and use the right arguments to convince others of your worth.

name: Deathtrip
description: Ayla's Deathtrip is a daring, stylish, high-octane FPS catered to the speedfreaks, mid-2000s weirdcore enthusiasts, hypercore fanatics and adrenaline junkies. Rack up style points as you strafe and bunnyhop through a demonic near-death experience.

name: Furball Blitz!
description: Join adorable animals in epic battles! Choose from 30 unique weapons and team up with friends in fast-paced PvP action. Dominate in Death Match, Team Death Match, and Zone Domination modes. Are you ready for furballs mayhem? Play Furball Blitz! Now!

name: Bloody Feet
description: The girl is sold to an island as a slave by a gang because of her beauty. She seized the opportunity to escape from the prison. She fought the enemy with her legs. With these beautiful feet she would strike down the enemies who had insulted her.

name: PolyZ
description: Explore a world devastated by apocalypse, teeming with the infected. Scavenge for survival amid scarcity, competing for resources. Will you trust in alliances for safety or brave the dangers alone? This is your journey in PolyZ (PVP/PVE).

name: Revolution Idle
description: Join an experience where each revolution takes you further into the unknown! Revolution Idle challenges you to multiply your accumulators to reach unimaginable heights. Will you manage to reach infinity?

name: Para Bellum
description: Necromancer's army is gathering! But he can't afford Necronomicon Prime so his army can only use free medieval equipment set... We believe that one battle sister can solve them well. Go Forth, Sister Para, Blast your enemy in this survivor-like shooter game!

name: Tank Factory Simulator
description: Tank Factory Simulator - you become the new director of the enterprise! Your task is to develop the factory, create new tanks, and ensure their production. Hire workers! Order materials! Create your own versions of heavy military equipment! All of this is available in this game!

name: Everlasting Snooze
description: You lost your memory of nothing but a mundane day. But why do mysterious men keep jamming into your life, all of them pointing to the day you forgot? Find out a hypnosis clinic receptionist's memory of an insignificant day in this BL visual novel.

name: Trading Towns
description: Trading Towns Idle is a simple and relaxing economic game in which you have to find ways to make money.

name: Melon Man
description: Embark on a deliciously delightful challenge with Melon Man, a charming 2D platformer that will test your platformer skills and tickle your taste buds! Join Melon Man on his quest to collect all his melons in this vibrant and exciting adventure.

name: Crystal Survivor
description: Defeat your enemies with super powerful charged shots! "Crystal Survivor" is a top-down roguelite arena shooter. Use the crystal's unique attack methods, various weapons, items, and relics to survive.

name: Deaf Wish
description: Uncover the horrors of Lily's life and help her navigate her feelings to make the best out of the life she didn't ask for.

name: The Adventures of Emoji 4: Fly High Mouse - Remastered
description: Step into The Adventures of Emoji 4 Remastered, where you immerse yourself in this mouse cartoon world playing a shoot em up side-scroller. Follow dynamic rules and use special weapons to defeat enemies for each level. Stay focused on the prize or you might find your game completely cut off.

name: Vice Grill: Synthwave Survival
description: Dive into Vice Grill: Synthwave Survival! Fight mutant hordes, whip up meals, tweak turrets, and tackle dynamic gigs in an epic 80s-style arena. Fuel your journey with Karl Casey's electrifying synthwave beats. Get ready to conquer this retro-futuristic world where survival meets style!

name: Orgasm Academy
description: Welcome to Orgasm Academy, an exhilarating adult only visual novel that transforms your studies into the most thrilling game of your life!

name: Neon Grid Defenders
description: Neon Grid Defenders is a sci-fi/Tron theme inspired tower defense game with roguelite elements to make each run unique. Build your path, place your towers, hook them up with unique upgrades and let the enemies have it!

name: Memorial Circuit
description: A scientist decides to participate in a secret research project inorder to bring back his wife whom he lost in the war. As he progresses in his research, he slowly encounters the sinister truths and threats hidden behind.

name: Eldorante
description: One fateful day, the ship Makane is riding across the sea comes under attack by a mysterious creature, and she ends up shipwrecked on an island with a bustling city and a labyrinth. Within, it is rumored that an immense treasure awaits those daring enough to find it.

name: Tomb of the Brave
description: A turn based strategy game. Rapid level upgrade, high equipment drop, happy combination. There are a total of 11 characters, each with unique skills, and they will learn new additional skills after transfer. The combat section has sufficient content and diverse gameplay.

name: Blood Purge: Releaseburg
description: Survive relentless zombie hordes in this rogue-like shooter. Brace yourself for intense gore and blood in the post-apocalyptic city, where every encounter demands precision and strategy.

name: Wandering Pet Garden
description: Wandering Pet Garden is a relaxing pet collecting game with elements of simulation, collecting and resource management.

name: Project Silver Shield
description: Hongcaopo,2007, a crime-infested small town in rural China, You are a young police officer at the township police station; you will witness the truth, beauty, falsehood and ugliness while using your strength to maintain peace and bring back the former prosperity.

name: Tactishia
description: Tactical, turn based board game 1v1 with offline mode. chess like strategy game adding more aspects to the board.

name: The Pool Rooms
description: Singleplayer simulation/ maze game. Here you will navigate through the gigantic complex and try to avoid the monsters. Equipped with only a flashlight and a fist to fight with. You will have to run.

name: D.W. The Picky Eater
description: Explore and share Marc Brown’s classic, adapted from the original storybook into an interactive animated adventure! D.W. and her entire family bring the story alive one word at a time, offering an easy to digest reading mode which is fully animated and voiced.

name: What Awaits, Aleksey?
description: Utilize your analytical skills to connect the dots and unveil hidden conspiracies! Join the ranks of the People's Intelligence Bureau as a junior cryptologist, decipher cryptic messages and unravel plots brewed up by enemies of the state. Or . . . decide to save them...?

name: Frogbound: The Legend of Sir Hopper
description: Frogbound: the Legend of Sir Hopper is a 2d pixel art platformer adventure where you will play as an intrepid amphibian hero! Discover the mystery of the hallowed relics, ancient and powerful artifacts, without succumbing to the perils of your treacherous quest.

name: Nightrunner
description: Buckle up in this minimalist retro arcade high score chaser.

name: Reach the Beat
description: Dive into the stunning world of "Reach The Beat," where your shooting skills are tested to the electrifying rhythms of electronic music. In this game, every move and shot you make creates a musical harmony, illuminated by the neon lights of an abstract city. Ready to feel the rhythm?

name: Kaidop
description: This game is a single player it has 4 to 5 stages to complete, those stages are very difficult to pass, this game is a challenge to pass those levels, the levels include obey, escape room, dodge ball, and guessing puzzle, and you will Enter the to an Endless runner.

name: Unfinished
description: a game, in pixel art.

name: Su: Unlocking the 4th Dimension
description: SU is a 2.5D deduction puzzle game. The submarine Nautilus suffers a mechanical failure during its voyage. Dr. Pierre investigates and finds anomalies in every area. Explore the deep blue depths, follow Dr. Pierre as he unravels the secrets of the Nautilus.

name: Free Chess
description: Free Chess is a free physics based chess simulator where you are free to play the game of chess with the freedom of however you like.

name: Middle School Zombie 2
description: In this adventure game, you play as a student trapped in a cursed junior high school, trying to escape while defeating zombies. The game world, presented in realistic images, gives players an immersive experience.

name: Bison Battle Machine
description: Bison battle machine – merciless battles on powerful tanks. Survival races and tough battles with realistic physics.

name: Office Perks: Act 1
description: A game dev's job is never easy, but it's a whole lot better when there are perks everywhere you look! Office Perks is a lighthearted slice-of-life visual novel loaded with playful dialog and lots of opportunites for the more intimate moments in the professional and personal lives of 20-somethings.

name: Iris
description: Iris is a narrative-driven indie horror game with PS2-era graphics. Players navigate a young woman's dream world, confronting symbolic monsters representing her past traumas like poverty, bulimia, bullying, and loneliness. It emphasizes the pursuit of happiness amidst life's struggles.

name: Organ Corruption
description: Randomized FPS immersive sim where players make their way through offices and labs to eliminate a series of big pharma CEOs. Synthesize ammunition and body modification from the organs of your enemies to become more powerful.

name: Dungeons of Dolkara
description: Dungeons of Dolkara is a 'rogue-like meets souls-like' rpg game following a dwarf and his adventures. Fight for as long as your candle can light your way through the dark caverns under the mountain of Dolkara.

name: Last Harem
description: The protagonist, awakened from cryosleep, is guided by Nina from the Bits organization and asked to engage in sexual activities in a harem. To save humanity, the protagonist must impregnate many women; it is the only way left.

name: PromptCrafter
description: The game is a command-line based crafting game with procedurally generated crafting trees. The crafting can be automated using programming-like automation.

name: Hero's Warband
description: Embark on an epic journey in Hero’s Warband, a captivating 2D Survival Autobattler. Recruit and manage a diverse array of heroes with unique classes and skills. Discover the perfect synergy between classes to suit your strategic vision. Lead your heroes to greatness in tactical battles!

name: Tasha Keies & Clavyce: Enigmes Et Trésors A Travers Les Âges
description: Tasha Keies & Clavyce : Enigmes Et Trésors A Travers Les Âges is an adventure, puzzle and treasure hunt game. To unlock a riddle from a real treasure, you have to search for objects in landscapes, and solve various puzzles of maths, history, words, small games, etc.

name: Graces: Posthumous Wish
description: Aki is haunted by a curse. In search of salvation, she travels into the memories of a dead classmate, where she must witness three eerie mystical stories and figure out how to break the shackles of misfortune.

name: Card Cultivation: Nine Palaces Illusory Realm
description: "Card Cultivation: Nine Palaces Illusory Realm" is a card-based cultivation survival game. Experience unique cultivation methods like the Nine Palace Flying Stars and the Five Elements within traditional cultural elements. Confront harsh climates and malevolent spirits from ancient texts.

name: Bird Feather: Aquamarine World
description: You are bird. Just fly! Collect feathers in open world bird game. Collect more feathers to unlock nice Kingfisher photos. After collect all feathers you can just fly and enjoy!

name: Inner Struggle
description: How long can she resist the unbearable weight of her own mind?

name: Phantasos
description: Phantasos is an innovative logical sandbox building game that opens the door to a world with no limits on creativity.

name: Deadzone Blackout
description: Deadzone Blackout is a competitive, fast-paced, arcade FPS. Immerse yourself in the pure adrenaline of a frantic, almost generic FPS. Master the fast-paced action, show off your quick reflexes and claim victory!

name: Rise
description: R.I.S.E is a cyberpunk action roguelike with intense combat, a focus on strategy, and endless progression. As a gladiator clone you must compete in the ETERNAL CONFLICT, a cycle of dystopian combat and bloodshed for the sake of humanity’s twisted entertainment and sponsored by Mega-Corporations across the galaxy.

name: Tile Slider
description: Tile-sliding puzzle game. 20 challenging levels that will test your problem-solving skills. Perfect for puzzle enthusiasts of all ages, this game combines classic mechanics with modern design, providing hours of engaging gameplay.

name: Elfscape: Ancestors
description: Elfscape: Ancestors is a story-driven, old-school platformer with RPG elements. Explore a vast underground world centered around an ancient temple city. Jump your way through challenging obstacles, decorate the city, and collect comics pages.

name: Harrowed World: What's Past Is Portents
description: Step into a dark and unforgiving world where vampires pull the strings of humanity. You are not the hero, you are not the villain, you are nothing but a pawn in schemes that you cannot even begin to understand.

name: Explorer: Adventure Awaits
description: Explore new places and uncover mysteries along the way. Travel through forgotten castles and wild forests, but be ready to confront challenges at every step, from cunning traps to formidable foes. The adventure awaits - will you dare to embark?

name: Realmbound
description: Realmbound is an immersive survival, adventure, and action RPG set in a medieval world. Players can build bases, start farms, recruit companions, explore vast environments, clear dungeons, and engage in thrilling combat. With a diverse selection of weapons and tools.

name: College Sex: Episode 8
description: A visual novel series about the sex lives of two college girls. In this episode, they meet with the assistant professor after hours to talk about an assignment.

name: College Gay Sex: Episode 1
description: An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD graphics, steamy ANIMATIONS, and realistic-looking characters. Meet Cody and embark on his wild journey as a gay college student. Episode 1 finds him horny and bored in his new room at the shared house.

name: College Sex: Episode 9
description: A visual novel series about the sex lives of two college girls. In this episode, they head to the library with the intention of studying, only to find themselves distracted.

name: College Gay Sex: Episode 3
description: An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD graphics, steamy ANIMATIONS, and realistic-looking characters. Cody’s journey as a gay college student continues with an intense menage at the gym as Jax recruits a senior student to help them train for the football team.

name: Sex Simulator 2: Cumshot Edition
description: A simulator that will lift your mood! And in fact, not only the mood. In this game control will take only one hands!

name: Voyeur Sex Toons
description: Erotic memory strategy game in which you assume the role of a voyeur, find pairs through the windows, develop your memory and relax watching the landscapes minimalist accompanied by relaxing music.

name: College Gay Sex: Episode 2
description: An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD graphics and steamy ANIMATIONS. Embark on Cody’s wild journey as a gay college student. Cody joins Jax on a hot date as a safety precaution. Steve turns out to be quite the charmer and seduces both college boys into some dirty restroom fun.

name: Hentai Tales: The Entrance To Isekai
description: You discover a door to another world, which leads to another world's tavern. This pub has beautiful girls of all different races and they are full of lust. What will happen there?

name: The Fallen Kingdoms
description: A brand-new board game that combines turn-based strategy and card-drafting mechanics to provide an enjoyable experience with friends! Build your kingdom, defeat your rivals, and seize the throne!

name: Brids Huddled Together
description: A puzzle game all about birds, featuring two gameplay modes. Come and bird-watch in the game!

name: Broken Lands Village
description: The real world no longer exists! I was trapped in this cursed Village made of inkblots on parchment. Every day I'm stalked by an assasin and stuck in a time loop. None of the residents remember me, although I myself have memories. I need to get out of here ASAP

name: Brushwood Saga
description: A simple adventure made in RPG Maker MV featuring turn-based combat, unique player characters, and plenty of dungeon crawling in a light-hearted adventure that steadily takes darker turns.

name: Bug Bite Tower Defence
description: Defend on your kitchen counter in this thrilling tower defence meets third-person shooter! Battle waves of insects, from pesky ants to colossal beetles. Earn cash for kills, upgrade weapons, and fortify with powerful turrets. Can you protect the sugar cube?

name: Burger Takeout
description: Burger Takeout - a cooperative fast-food simulator. Manage a burger joint, balancing between orders and inventory supplies. For success, raise your rating and keep an eye on finances, adapting to the market. Strategy and teamwork will be significant assets in this dynamic gameplay.

name: Breed Kim Il-Sung
description: With millions of men dead as a result of the Korean War, the Dear Leader needs YOU to help rebuild the glorious DPRK in this action-roguelike FPS. Liquidate capitalist agitators to earn veneration from the Kims and ensure their bloodline perseveres to see a future free from imperialist aggression!

name: Card Clash Chronicles
description: Embark on a journey across a cool little world, mastering the art of the Card Clash card game. You'll face off against six legendary opponents to earn your ticket to the World Card Game Tournament!

name: Cash Cleaner Simulator
description: Start your money laundering business in this chill simulator! Use various not-so-powerful tools to restore dirty money bills and some unusual items to their full, crisp potential! Spend your hard-earned crypto to upgrade and cozy up your lab! The cash is in your hands!

name: Casino Simulator
description: Casino Simulator Expand Your Casino From Scratch, Hire Employees, Customize It, Gamble, Enjoy Your Own Casino

name: CatMelon: Suika Game
description: Combine several adorable cats dressed as fruits inside their favorite playing space: the cardboard box! Match two identical cats to create an increasingly larger cat until you reach the CatMelon. Develop your best strategy to remain at the top of the ranking!

name: Cats Hidden in England
description: Find and discover 100 cute cats hidden across England in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Cats in Heat: Sunshine Resort
description: Adult-Only Casual Adventure game with animations, minigames, a funny story, and 3 cute catgirls!

name: Cemitério São Sacramento
description: Live the day to day life of someone who suffers from insomnia and sleep paralysis, do something to pass the time like washing dishes, watching a movie, taking a shower, until you can sleep again… Something “peculiar” might happen in this rented house.

name: City Legends: The Witness in the Rye - Collector's Edition
description: The line between life and death is as thin as the autumn breeze. Will you escape, or will Darkwood claim you as another victim of its harvest?

name: Clever Girls
description: Clever Girls is a story-driven, relationship-focused, turn-based DinosauRPG! Outwit poachers with stealth and teamwork while also navigating relationship drama. Explore a mysterious decaying island, defeat overwhelming odds and escape capture.

name: Crystal Nexus: Alien Siege
description: Dive into the strategic depths of "Crystal Nexus: Alien Siege," where the essence of tower defense merges with the ingenuity of deck-building. Operate from a corporate space station, leveraging your wits and a futuristic arsenal to counter a relentless alien threat.

name: Demonica
description: Boomer Twin-Stick Shooter Rogueilike. Swap your weapons and slash to replenish your resources. Learn the enemy's attack patterns and health types, then, determine the best way to slay them based on your current battle status. Every combat encounter is unique in the ever-changing land of DEMONICA.

name: Disinherited
description: A roguelike 2D platform-action game about catching, throwing, and parrying your way through the Reaper's catacombs. Why? To spite your dead, banking mogul father.

name: Ducking Grenades
description: Ducking Grenades is a physics based game in which the protagonist traverses the world in a very unconventional way: With grenades! Hunt down the evil General Goosey and his minions and bring peace to the universe in this hand-made, fast-paced 2D side-scrolling action game!

name: Egg Chef
description: Egg Chef challenges you to cook and deliver eggs for points while avoiding dropping eggs. Play by yourself for a high score or online with friends to see who the best egg chef is. Cook green eggs to earn items for a competitive advantage.

name: Fallen Light
description: Cory wakes up several years into the future, everything has changed and his friends are missing. Complete puzzles, hide from monsters and explore the world around you to try and found what happened and where your friends are.

name: Field of Growth: A Farmer's Odyssey
description: Embark on a first-person farming simulator in Field of Growth: A Farmer's Odyssey. Cultivate your land, craft, gather resources, raise livestock, and defend your farm. Every sunrise brings new adventures. Are you ready to grow?

name: Flipping Legend DX
description: Flip fast or die trying! Flipping Legend DX is a fast-paced action arcade game. It's easy to learn, but takes lightning reflexes to master.

name: Floor 10
description: You have to take some weird elevator to the 10th floor. Stay alert to get to the 10th floor.

name: Gunbot Diplomacy
description: Splatter slimes, massacre mutants, and assemble your perfect Gunbot! Survive hordes of enemies in this top-down shooter roguelite by customizing your weapons on the unique upgrade grid, and pick from a wide variety of build-defining modules and wacky base bots for a new experience every run.

name: Heather The Smither
description: Heather The Smither is a blacksmith simulator where you have to make the weapons, shields, armor and tool of the different species of animale that come to your forge, with the goal of supporting your family and helping your father.

name: Hellaxy
description: Fast-paced, high-difficulty 2D space dogfighting roguelite game.

name: Memories of Glass Maiden
description: An adventure game that lets you enjoy the story and flow of the 'Glass universe,'

name: New Brooklyn Bridge Tycoon
description: New York City just turned the Brooklyn bridge into a park, and the visitors are in desperate need of food! Now’s your chance to make it big in the Big Apple! Build food booths, grow produce, or locally source ingredients until you're the only competition left in New Brooklyn Bridge Tycoon!

name: New Heaven
description: In this first-person shooter (FPS) adventure set in the wake of a devastating meteor shower, players are thrust into the heart of a desperate struggle for survival against hordes of undead monstrosities.

name: Nexus Knights
description: In "Nexus Knights," players embark on an exhilarating journey through time and dimensions, battling against the forces of chaos to preserve the stability of the universe. As Nexus Knights, they must hone their skills, forge alliances, and unravel the secrets of the multiverse.

name: Night Breaker
description: Venture into an unusual, alien world, full of danger and mysteries, in this sci-fi Metroidvania. Grab your gear and face the challenge of sustaining a once-thriving space colony. Can you bring this place back to life? Are you ready to uncover all secrets lurking in darkness?

name: Nimbusfall
description: Dive into a new and thrilling boss rush-style video game where revenge is the only motivation. Step into the shoes of the last survivor of a race decimated by The Moon, now seeking to settle the score with the culprit of its extinction. But what secrets does The Moon hold?

name: Ninja Remix
description: Build your clan, unleash unique jutsus, and expand with unique ninjas. Dive into battles with multiplayer modes, featuring both co-op and PvP, all set to a cool Phonk beat.

name: Noclip
description: Chapter-based Backrooms experience. Embark on a chilling journey through the unknown. Visuals based on early 2000's camcorders.

name: Nolgorb's Ordeal
description: A challenging 3D platformer with little room for error. Escape a dungeon by jumping to the top, and trade your collectables to aid in your ordeal.

name: One Lie
description: One Lie is a choice-driven adult visual novel about a young man not having the best start to his adulthood. His best friend betrays him and he decides to start his life somewhere else. Will he find peace, love and new friendships? Of course, he will. With whom? That's up to you.

name: OranguTangle
description: Give your grapple-arm a stretch, gather some friends, and swing towards victory!

name: Outergleam
description: Explore liminal environments, redeem powerful shadow beings, and restore the astral realms as you become a guardian of the afterlife gates. Dive into the unknown and uncover the secrets of the Outergleam.

name: Pink Noise
description: "Pink Noise" is a visual novel in the genre of psychological horror in the retro atmosphere of the 90s. Following the tradition of "summer horror", it will tell you a unique story about several teenagers who by chance encounter unknown forces.

name: Pitta
description: This story may change because of under development. Story is that thief robot try to steal many things. It is a chase game. You can escape from enemy with various Power up item.

name: Piroot
description: Journey to the center of the planet in Piroot, an open world adventure! Explore and survive as a shipwreck's lonely survivor. What secrets lie at the planet's core, and can you trust the voice leading you there?

name: Playing Kafka
description: There are things that often fail on nothing but themselves. Is there even a way out? Playing Kafka is a narrative adventure full of impenetrable schemes, insidious plot twists and conversations that slip out of hand. Based on Kafka’s life and his work, developed with Kafka experts.

name: Shrouded Mind
description: Shrouded Mind: pits scientist Kaiser Manger and US Marshal Andre Kar against a deadly virus turning islanders into berserk maniacs. Racing against time, they must find a cure while battling through perilous jungles and uncovering a sinister conspiracy. Will they save the island before it's too late?

name: Solendara
description: Enigmatic Hack and slash style Action RPG where ancient mythology and magic blend with modern civilization~A story that reveals the forbidden, the desires, and the secrets of the world~

name: Workplace Fantasy: New Girl Chapter
description: New character expansion package for workplace fantasy, adding two new girls, complete story flow, and more CG animations. (Need to have a workplace fantasy basic version to play)

name: Witchroid Vania: A Magical Girl’s Fantastical Adventures
description: Join mage-in-training Lily on an epic adventure! Explore a multitude of worlds, including forests, deserts, and dungeons, in hopes of becoming a full-fledged mage!

name: White: Invasion
description: WHITE is a first-person, open-world action-adventure game. As players explore the open world, they discover and repair the destroyed facilities, engage in fast and arcade-like combat with fantastical creatures, and delve into quests.

name: Wild Mars
description: A sci-fi simulation and survival game. Manage oxygen and energy, make water from ice, resist cold and radiation, grow food, mine minerals, upgrade the machinery in your Mars base just enough to produce enough fuel to return to Earth . Research and combine new elements to improve fuel production.

name: Who Wears The Crown?
description: Test your brain and your brawn in the toughest chess game ever made! Play against a tough chess engine to build your path and climb upward to claim the crown, but be careful! One small blunder and you risk losing your progress. Heavy is the head that wears the crown, but who will wear it?

name: Basketball Strike
description: Sin descripción

name: High School Fighting Game
description: "High School Fighting Game" is all about exciting high school battles in an anime atmosphere. You can play in different ways: Story Mode: Step into an engaging story filled with high school challenges and strong competition. Each choice you make affects your journey to become the best high school fighter.

name: Real Bike Racing
description: Sin descripción

name: Baba Yaga
description: Shamble your way across the Russian countryside as you try to find Baba Yaga a new home. Avoid villager watchtowers, throw flaming jars of oil and medicine, scare off those pesky birds, all while trying to keep yourself stable!

name: The Baba Yaga
description: The Baba Yaga is a PC horror game inspired by the original Slenderman game in which you play as a boy who is looking for his sister in the woods. Upon finding her locked up in a cave, you’ll discover the game’s objective– find the missing keys to save her. As you scour the forest, you will find yourself being followed by a dangerous, looming entity. The monster in this game is based on Slavic folktale about the ogress, Baba Yaga (Baba Jaga), who is known to consume children.

name: A Solitaire Mystery
description: A collection of 23 mysterious solitaires, with more potentially being added in the future. The solitaires included vary from fairly standard cardgames to funky reimplementations of other games in solitaire form.

name: Baba Yaga's Helpmate
description: A small point-and-click adventure about a girl lost in the forest. Baba Yaga agrees to let you stay overnight and lead you out of the forest in exchange for helping out with household chores.

name: One Night With Baba Yaga: A Gnosis Tale
description:
You are Clara, a young woman desperate to save her family. You've exhausted all options except one: seek the fabled Mother of All Witches, Baba Yaga.

The witch offers to help you... if you can survive a night in her hut. But you won't just have to survive the monsters and miscreants within... you must find Baba Yaga's personal chambers. Only then can you make your case. It is a dire, seemingly hopeless situation...

name: Escape from Baba Yaga
description: Escape from Baba Yaga is a 2d platformer where you play as Vasilisa the Beautiful, running from Baba Yaga the witch. Along the way, you rescue other children lost in the wilderness. But be careful, if you leave a child behind or are caught with a lost child, the witch will gobble them up!

name: Baba Yaga's Cosy House
description: Welcome to Baba Yaga's Cosy House! An entry for the the SA GAME JAM 2023!

name: PictoChat
description: Sin descripción

name: SM64EX Coop: Mega Man X
description: A mod for SM64EX Coop that adds Mega Man X.

name: Escape Baba Yaga
description: In this game players have to work together to escape the evil baba yaga's house. They have to look for the clues and come up with the final code before the witch catches them.

name: Babushka Baba Yaga
description: Atmospheric text-based adventure game about slavic folklore.

name: Baba Yaga's cabin
description: Adventure game, based on Slavic mythology and fairy tales.

name: Yaga's Candy House
description:
Baba Yaga's house on one leg is home to many mysteries - one of them being the witch's favorite milk candy. Alas, she doesn't like to share, so you must go out on your own to have a taste.

In this thrilling round of Red Light, Green Light (or as we in Poland say, Raz, dwa, trzy... Baba Jaga patrzy!) make sure to grab 3 sweets and run back out of the house
in one piece - so that you hopefully don't end up the old hag's meal!

name: Yaga's Hunt
description: There are tales of a dreary forest, where Baba Yaga, a child-hunting witch roams! Some kids don't believe the rumors, and decide to camp out one night as a display of their bravery. Be the one to show them how true those stories really were.

name: Babayka
description: Explode All - From explodes you will get black pieces!

name: Baba Yaga's Great Adventure
description: Baba Yaga game

name: One Last Breath: Seeds of Hope Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pokémon Africanus
description:
Immerse yourself in the history of Ancient Europe in Pokémon Africanvs, This begins in the year 219 BC. and takes place throughout the entire 2nd Punic War.

Our protagonist is a cadet of the Sagunto guard, who is awakened by the centurion Cepressus because Carthage is besieging the city. After escaping and getting to safety, our protagonist will defeat gymnasiums, becoming stronger and ending up hitting back at Hannibal, the Carthaginian leader, but he will not do it alone, you will meet different historical figures during the game. Interact with them and earn their friendship in Pokémon Africanvs!

name: Tanks Defense
description:
Defend HQ using tanks and Turrets in the Story Campaign or online!

Alien civilization has attacked Earth! You have been appointed commander of special military bases. Using tanks, turrets and special abilities you must destroy the waves of upcoming opponents and prevent them from destroying the base!

name: Metal Gear Solid HD Edition - Premium Package
description: A premium edition of the bundled Metal Gear Solid HD Edition, that includes the two games plus a unique soundtrack and a 450 pages artbook of the first three games.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All Star Battle - Golden Experience Box
description: A limited edition of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All Star Battle, that includes the game, the soundtrack, a special Jotaro and Star Platinum figure and a unique metal plate of Giorno.

name: Gran Turismo 2000
description: Gran Turismo 2000 is the original title of the project that became Gran Turismo 3: A-Spec, with the name being used for several demonstration builds and one demo disc. It was based on Gran Turismo 2, where the physics and graphics were updated to showcase what Polyphony Digital could do with the new hardware in the PlayStation 2.

name: Ninja Gaiden Sigma 2: Premium Box
description: A premium edition of Ninja Gaiden Sigma 2 that includes the basic game, the game soundtrack, a guide book and a special necklace.

name: Voir Dire
description:
An absurd jury-packing auto-battler created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 55: "Summoning"

This game takes about 10-15 minutes to complete and has a definitive ending. Hang in there 'til the end!

name: Street Fighter 30th Anniversary Collection: International
description: The Japanese special version of the same game collection but with an extra booklet that shows every character move list.

name: Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain - Special Edition
description: A special edition of Metal Gear Solid V that includes the game, a special booklet, a collector's disc and a map of the game.

name: Faery: Swapped
description: When you discover that your family has been invaded by faeries, there is only one thing to do: take names, and kick...well, actually, just take names.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Virginia
description: A distraught Mother who refuses to believe her Son is really gone, Virginia moved closer to Newt, TX in hopes of conducting her own search.

name: Secret Pie: End Roll
description: Secret Pie DLC END ROLL!

name: Ticket to Ride: Nordic Expansion
description: Discover a new tale to tell as you set off to the northern reaches of the world! Build routes between colourful Nordic cities, claim the sprawling Murmansk-Lieksa route and earn the Globetrotter bonus in the world’s favourite train adventure game!

name: Melvor Idle: Into the Abyss
description: Discover a new dimension to Melvor Idle as you descend into the Abyssal Realm! Encounter new challenges, unique environments and mechanics while mastering new Abyssal Skills. As you delve deeper, the stakes get higher… but will you rise to glory?

name: Beat Saber: Daft Punk - "Veridis Quo"
description: Get the track ‘Veridis Quo’ by Daft Punk on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Daft Punk Music Pack.

name: Stacklands 2000
description: Stacklands 2000 is the second DLC for Stacklands. Go to a modern world where you manage a big city's wellbeing, collect science to build futuristic technologies, prepare for natural disasters and more!

name: Sea of Thieves: 2024 Deluxe Bundle
description: Included with the 2024 Deluxe Edition of Sea of Thieves, this bundle contains a wealth of additional content, including a varied assortment of cosmetics, currency to spend at the Outpost shops and access to digital bonus media.

name: Beat Saber: Daft Punk - "Lose Yourself to Dance (feat. Pharrell Williams)"
description: Get the track ‘Lose Yourself to Dance (feat. Pharrell Williams)’ by Daft Punk on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Daft Punk Music Pack.

name: Music Sim Empire
description: Rediscover music history. Bring it back to life and shape it as you envision. Manage your musicians and build an empire. Upgrade your musicians, studios, and rooms. Make interesting decisions, whether you're a casual player or a perfectionist.

name: Little Angels
description: Little Angels is a roguelite arena shooter game where various lovely maid-warriors battle waves of enemies and powerful bosses. Upgrade the maid-warriors, choose from a variety of weapons and items to create your own build and protect Earth's peace from enemies!

name: Pushing It! With Sisyphus
description: A game about a very happy guy and his boulder.

name: Pokémon: Golden Emerald
description: A Pokémon Fangame made on RPG Maker XP, using the Pokémon Script Project : Evolved starter kit. Explore a brand new region and battle trainers with your Pokémon ! Resolve puzzles, save people, obtain all 8 badges, beat the Elite 4, and more !

name: Bingo Beavers: Kitchen
description: Embark on a new adventure in the Bingo Beavers game as you expand the beaver mansion with a charming new room - the Kitchen.

name: Resident Evil: Grim Beginnings
description: Welcome to Resident Evil: Grim Beginnings - an solo developed, Game Boy demake of the original Resident Evil.

name: Starfall: Operation Outro
description: Lead a powerful space battleship and bring victory to humanity in the midst of an endless war.

name: LingerieS
description: The main character, Aoi Miyamae, is asked by his twin sister, Riko, to dress up as a woman and work as a clerk at 'LingerieS', a high-end women's lingerie specialty store, in her place. Aoi discovers the depth of women's lingerie and develops a bond with the women who visit the store...

name: Onoow
description: TALESCAPE - ONOOW is an escape room game for single player. Explore in the story-rich tales and find out what the truth hidden in the mysterious story. Get items and use or combine them for escape from the story!

name: Star Conflict: Salamander
description: This pack includes:Unique rank 16 engineering frigate SalamanderKinetic weapon “CFER-24 nailgun”Active module “Kongmíng manual controls”Portrait “Fire guardian”Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 30 days!

name: Beholder: Conductor
description: A Beholder series spin-off. Become a conductor of the Determination Bringer train: monitor passengers, report incidents, and carry out important Ministry assignments — whose level of secrecy depends only on your loyalty. And remember: mission success is very important to you!

name: Spiderbro 2
description: Help Shadowbro overcome a computer worm come to life and save the multiverse from colliding! Collect items, talk to employees, solve puzzles and explore the secrets of a company that caused everything to happen!

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: It's a Night Magic the Arrival of Spring All In Pack
description: CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 It's a Night Magic the Arrival of Spring ALL in Pack is a set that combines somewhat mature costumes and events. This pack will help you feel more open with the arrival of spring. 7 Costume Sets 2 Hairstyles 2 Events

name: Shashingo: Learn Japanese with Photography - Additional Camera Filters
description: This DLC gives you an additional pack of 6 Camera Filters to use while taking photos in Shashingo!

name: Sky Roller Coaster
description: Prepare yourself for a heart-pounding adventure like no other in the exhilarating Sky Roller Coaster game!

name: Star Conflict: Procyon - Deluxe Edition
description: This pack includes:Rank 8 Federation Suppressor class Destroyer ProcyonWeapon: CoilgunPortrait «Taylor Nelson»Active modules:Photon EmitterMultiphase shieldRepelling BeamWormhole projectorAdditionally, the pilot receives:Permanent 10% bonus to credits gainPattern «Smooth curves»Decor «Risky cargo»Additionally, the pilot receives the modul

name: Something's Not Right
description: Ever gone somewhere and thought "Something's Not Right"? Explore, investigate and experience an ever changing environment. Enter the world and decide if everything is the same or whether something is different. Make your choice carfefully as it may be the last decision you ever make.

name: Purgatory Survivors
description: Purgatory Survivors is a top-down shooter with roguelike elements. Plunge into a dark fantasy world infested with demons and despair all fighting for you to fail. Choose your character, primary and secondary guns, and achieve the best synergy with the upgrades to pass the purgatory trial.

name: Ranch Mayhem
description: Ranch Mayhem is an active idle game. Explore 15 crops, face invasions, and spend them for bonuses. Enjoy the changing seasons and the farming adventure at your own pace.

name: Trouble of Tabu
description: Take up the challenge and aim your sword to the ground in this true precision platformer. Struggle through the various challenges and try to finish the game in one go.

name: Liquidum: Small & Tricky
description: A new level pack with 10 levels for Liquidum, a water-themed logic puzzle game.

name: Ruby's Land
description: Delve into the mysteries of Ruby's Land as a reporter investigating the disappearance of the headmaster after a fire. Explore the park, solve puzzles and uncover the truth behind the disappearances of children. Use a special gadget to survive in this terrifying environment.

name: PUIQ: Demons
description: PUIQ: Demons is a game where you must survive several waves of demons and bosses for 30 minutes to win. Gain powers, passives and combine them to get buffs, as well as buy turrets to help you on this journey.

name: Starship Troopers: Terran Command - Urban Onslaught
description: A ferocious Arachnid onslaught has swept through the city’s suburbs, completely overwhelming local police forces. Never before have they faced such a massive and meticulously orchestrated assault.

name: Slime Cores
description: A shape-shifting, pixel-art, story-rich action adventure metroidvania for PC

name: Tales of Lost Ages Vol 1.
description: Anthology of Four 3D Action-Adventure Dungeon-Crawlers!

name: Berkeley's Maid: Remake Edition
description: The ghosts of the past, recounting the tragic past

name: Beat Saber: Daft Punk - "One More Time"
description: Get the track ‘One More Time’ by Daft Punk on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Daft Punk Music Pack.

name: The Ascot
description: Anything might happen to you on the way to the convenience store. You might even run into a guy handing out cursed ascots that lead you to lost fortunes guarded by terrible monsters. Can you nab 100% of the Hizkwelderbang fortune, or will you be lunch for the Eagle Beast?

name: Beat Saber: Daft Punk - "Technologic"
description: Get the track ‘Technologic’ by Daft Punk on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Daft Punk Music Pack.

name: Beat Saber: Daft Punk - "Da Funk / Daftendirekt"
description: Get the track ‘Da Funk / Daftendirekt’ by Daft Punk on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Daft Punk Music Pack.

name: NeverGoingHome
description: Ready for a fast paced rogue-like action shooter with upgrades, abilities and loads of weapons?, well you found it!

name: RSSU: Retro Style Soviet Undies
description: RSSU - Retro Style Soviet Undies is an adult visual novel with a unique story, made in pinup style and filled with humor, sex and romance. Go back to the 80s, meet beautiful Soviet women and discover the exciting mystery of the town of Maryino.

name: Limitless
description: LIMITLESS is a free-to-play PvP arena shooter where players master dynamic movement mechanics, utilizing grappling hooks to outmaneuver opponents in fast-paced battles.

name: Skufs and Alt-Girls
description: An immersive simulator of Russian skuf with immersion in the atmosphere! On state portal has started giving out alt-girls and your goal is to collect them all!

name: SOVL: Deepwood Guardians
description: This is a Faction Pack for SOVL - Fantasy Warfare. It adds the Deepwood Guardians to the game.

name: Teachers Secrets
description: In "Teacher's Secret" you become a young student who accidentally discovers that teachers hide deeply hidden secrets and romances.

name: Skeleton Scramble Deluxe 2
description: Skeleton Scramble Deluxe 2 is a fast-paced tower defense/strategy hybrid. Choose from a variety of factions and classes, each with numerous viable strategies, and battle against your friends or CPU players in fierce 5-10 minute battles.

name: Moon War Meta
description: An open world space action RPG adventure that can be played both alone and together.

name: Pirates: Rogue's Fortune
description: Pirates: Rise of Thieves is a roguelite exploration and survival game. You're a pirate who explores the seabed to find as many resources as possible, before having to go up to defend his boat from attacks. You have access to a multitude of improvements to optimize each of your run.

name: Bones Beneath
description: Explore the Egyptian underworld in this precision platformer! Jump, whip, and dash your way through a challenging, interconnected world that weaves linear gauntlets with open-ended exploration.

name: Quick Cast Chaos
description: An unlikely hero ventures across a magical kingdom to defeat the monstrous Moon Menace and rescue the Star Sovereign.

name: Shimapanzer Strike!
description: At Knight's Cross Academy, the most prestigious military academy on the continent of Lykaia, you will learn the military tactics needed to effectively command your squad of tanks, infantry, and magical girls to defeat a ruthless enemy only interested in the total subjugation of your world and race.

name: Star Conflict: Salamander - Deluxe Edition
description: This pack includes:Unique rank 16 engineering frigate SalamanderKinetic weapon “CFER-24 nailgun”Active module “Kongmíng manual controls”Portrait “Fire guardian”Additionally, the pilot receives:Permanent 10% bonus to credits gainPattern “Crawling”Decor “Monarch’s cocoon”Additionally, the pilot receives the modules:Mass Shield GeneratorAuto

name: Liquidum: Mirrors
description: A level pack with 8 levels for Liquidum, a water-themed logic puzzle game.

name: Pixel Defender
description: Pixel Defender is a 2D tower defense game with retro pixel aesthetics and direct character control.

name: Little Brats!
description: A playground simulator

name: Please Insert Disc
description: Please Insert Disc is a puzzle horror game about navigating the underbelly of a 2000's era gaming console in an attempt to restore its functionality. From the creators of Home Safety Hotline.

name: Mouse World
description: You are a human who has been transformed into a rat. Your objective is to find your human body in this RPG game in a medieval world. You will have to survive all the dangers that may arise along your way.

name: Remote Island
description: Remote Island is a sandbox game where you play as a man who has just crashed on a mysterious island occupied by other survivors. Will you find a way to leave, or will you enjoy yourself and stay ?

name: Pinball FX: Universal Pinball - TV Classics
description: Classic television shows from the small screen to the tips of your flipper fingers. Play three tables inspired by iconic TV shows in the Universal Pinball: TV Classics bundle pack.

name: Taxi Life: VIP Vintage Convertible Car
description: Take your clients on an unforgettable ride through Barcelona in the VIP Vintage Convertible Car, a top-end car inspired by the most beautiful jewels in automotive history!

name: Bingo Beavers: Bathroom
description: Embark on a new adventure in the Bingo Beavers game as you expand the beaver mansion with a charming new room - the Bathroom.

name: Silent
description: It's a different way to feel the emotion of fear. While playing a game, even the slightest sound will cause you to start the game from the beginning. While you are trying to solve a mysterious case, you have an accident on the forest road. You must find a way out of the forest.

name: Wallbound
description: Welcome to Wallbound. You have been trapped in Chamber 7, with little chance of escape. Wallbound is an FPS Parkor-style game, where you can run, jump, slide past all the obstacles and get to the exit. Good Luck!

name: Trans-Siberian Legends: Beautiful Girls
description: This DLC adds beautiful girls to passenger cars.

name: Spellarium 2
description: that's the Part 2 of our successfull Spellarium series. Our world consists of 6 elements: the Earth, Water,Fire,Light,Darkness and Water. So, we need to create the 7th element. The game has 110 Match 3 levels plus Solitaires, Spot the Difference and Hidden Objects scenes. Plus a nice town to build.

name: Slime Clicker
description: Bright adventure in the world of slimes with RPG elements! Battle bosses, dive into minigames, level up your character, and unlock unique weapons. Wishlist now!

name: Tower! Simulator 3: KMCO Airport
description: As the seventh busiest airport in the United States, MCO facilitates the travel of over 40 million passengers each year. It is renowned for its distinctive hub-and-spoke architectural design, which enhances operational efficiency and passenger convenience.

name: Shift Legacy Collection
description: Step into the monochromatic and mind-bending universe of the Shift series developed by Antony Lavelle, where black and white landscapes hide more than meets the eye. This collection unites the original four titles - Shift, Shift 2, Shift 3, and Shift 4.

name: Skate O'Clock
description: Skate O'Clock is dynamic, action, skateboarding game in retro style. Win the race against time by collecting coins through multiple levels.

name: Bolt Runner
description: Take control of a robot soldier on the run from a ruined future as you travel through time portals to prevent a dystopian reality!

name: Shogun
description: SHOGUN is an arcade style shooter that emphasizes running and gunning to stay alive. Rip through waves of increasingly difficult enemies hell-bent on your doom by shooting, looting, and eluding a bullet hell of cartoonish horror. Refuse death, explode with burning rage and tear asunder!!!

name: Tomboy Adventure 2
description: Start a relaxing adventure together with your (girl) friend!

name: One Military Camp: Biomes
description: Explore new ways to organize your camp with the new versions of biomes for One Military Camp. It is now possible to choose any of the five biomes in their clear version.

name: Beat Saber: Daft Punk - "Get Lucky (feat. Pharrell Williams and Nile Rodgers)"
description: Get the track ‘Get Lucky (feat. Pharrell Williams and Nile Rodgers)’ by Daft Punk on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Daft Punk Music Pack.

name: Silk Suki: Chat Messaging Game
description: Spend a night with Suki! Chat with Suki, complete missions, unlock poses, and fully undress her! 16 kawaii poses to unlock, and all clothing can be removed! Try out the free demo.

name: Terunyan to Amanoiwato
description: Terunyan to Amanoiwato is a rhythm game in which Terunyan wanders around and collects elementals. Elementals can be efficiently gathered by collecting them in rhythm to the music.

name: Solium Infernum: Belphegor, Paragon of Impiety
description: Take the Infernal Throne as Belphegor, the Paragon of Impiety, a diabolical inventor whose contraptions are designed to serve one wicked purpose; to corrupt, weaken, and enslave!

name: Assault Suit Leynos 2: Saturn Tribute
description: Modify your robot and head to the battlefield!

name: Polygonal Passage
description: A low-poly version based on the well-known puzzle game Portal! For people who are bored and just want a casual puzzle experience.

name: Silverwind
description: An RPG/Action Adventure game. With focus on gauntlet-style combat, traps, boss fights and beautiful pixel-art scenery.

name: Rusty Dusty
description: "Rusty Dusty es un juego 2D donde un robot de limpieza lucha por su libertad en un edificio residencial, enfrentando temas de clasismo. Los jugadores toman decisiones importantes que afectan el destino del protagonista."

name: The Backworlds
description: RUN, JUMP, ESCAPE. Endlessly high buildings of dead ruins are towering over a giant chasm of green mist. But the reality of our world is seeping in, and some familiar places are now stuck there. This is how you are invited there - against your will. Enter the hostile realm of the BACKWORLDS.

name: Monolit
description: Monolit is a cooperative, real-time and tile-based multiplayer survival game where your main goal is to develop your base camp, survive waves of incoming enemies and defeat bosses in an unknown and mysterious world.

name: Soul King: Out of the Box
description: Lynn must call on her abilities and blasters once agian to brave the dangers of this new land, face new nightmares, and find the pieces needed to get legendary creator and dream weaver Grimzo Out of the Box

name: Below Surface
description: Fast-paced 3D horror game about exploring a supernatural cave

name: Spirit Swap
description: A love story of a body swap between a man and a woman sharing one body.

name: Rich City
description: Rich City - Real-time strategy and clicker in one person. Take the reins and make a real economic oasis in the middle of an empty meadow! Build and demolish buildings, collect profits, fulfill the demands of the citizens and you will definitely be rewarded for your labors!

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: It's a Night Magic Spring Full Swing All In Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Human Upgrade Labs
description: You will be taking on various tests/puzzles in Human Upgrade Labs. These tests will essentially be various mini games, 30 of them, placed into several different categories, created using multiple hand painted and sometimes experimental visual styles and combined into a single story.

name: Hoodies Squad: Alcoholypse
description: In Grochow, something strange is causing the residents to behave abnormally. Three inseparable buddies must restore balance by discovering the causes of this confusion and heading deep into the mysterious Alkoholipsa. Will they succeed in restoring normalcy before the neighborhood collapses?

name: Vagrus: The Riven Realms - Old Acquaintances
description: Vagrus – The Riven Realms: Old Acquaintances, introduces two new Companions with new abilities, individual and specific loyalty quests that explore their own stories, new enemies and rewards, as well as newfound additions to hirelings that can join owners of the DLC.

name: Paper Play VR
description: Experience creative minigames as the world's biggest paper playground unfolds right in front of your eyes! We have crazy games, difficult challenges and a heartwarming story for you and your friends, so come and join the party!

name: The Last Farmer
description: "The Last Farmer" is not just a tale of survival; it's a journey of restoration. Amidst the sprawling deserts of a forgotten Texas, your farm becomes a symbol of hope and persistence.

name: SGS Battle For: Dien Bien Phu
description: The emblematic siege battle of Dien Bien Phu that ended French rule over Indochina in 1954. Fight for the defense of the fortified camp or try to storm it, in order to reach the upcoming Geneva Peace Conference in a position of force.

name: Nanuka: Secret of the Shattering Moon
description: A new exciting cinematic 2D puzzle platformer set in a colourful cartoony land. Nanuka is utterly unprepared for the adventure ahead. She has to use her martial art combat skills to defeat quirky foes while making friends that will be key to uncovering the secret of the shattering moon.

name: The Last Oasis Before Chastity
description: Amidst the barren desert, an oasis shines like a beacon of hope, accessible only by a solitary road. The scorching sands loom on one side, while the weight of the past hangs heavy on the other. It’s a place where one can escape the harsh realities, but also confront them.

name: Time Journey
description: This game is perfect for players who relish sci-fi mysteries, engaging storylines, and intellectual challenges. "Time Journey" invites you to decipher the secrets of your identity and the alien lab, making every discovery a step closer to the truth.

name: Step into the Abyss
description: Step into the Abyss is a detective adventure that combines an intriguing, branching storyline, forcing the player to constantly make choices, and a dystopian world ruled by dictatorship. The noir style adds charm, and the unusual approach to gameplay will provide you with a unique gaming experience.

name: Stellaris: Cosmic Storms
description: A new phenomenon has been observed around the Galaxy - storms are sweeping through system. Prepare your Empire and brace to face this new upcoming threat, and leverage possibilities that open when your opponents are weakened by it.

name: Stellaris: The Grand Archive
description: The Galaxy is vast and full of wonders, and it is up to you to store records of all the unique lifeforms and marvels you will meet. Build a new megastructure, and collect examples of specimens you will meet in your space-faring adventures!

name: Assistant to the Lost Detective: Remaster
description: A novel-style mystery adventure game. Explore 2D top-down maps! Enjoy easy puzzles and comical text. Become the assistant to the lost detective Chiho-chan and help solve mysteries!

name: KunKun Defender
description: Oh no! The Kun Virus has broken out. A group of zombies infected with the Kun Virus is using Iron Mountain to crazily ram into any living creature. You must pick up your gun to fight against the onslaught of Kun-infected zombies until Big Joe arrives in a helicopter to rescue you.

name: House of Cards: TD
description: A game where you must defend yourself against robots that have come from the future, intending exclusively to destroy all of humanity. You must employ various strategies and characters to survive this time-traveling journey! Are you up for this adventure?

name: Kwark: Online and Multiplayer
description: Kwark is a game about a character who needs to complete levels and then something impossible happens at the end! The game can be either 1-person or 3-person! But now a MULTIPLAYER has been added. Play with friends, and have fun!.

name: Spin Hero
description: Spin Hero is a roguelike deckbuilder, where you spin the reels to decide your fate. Collect powerful symbols for your inventory, adapt and evolve your strategy, learning from defeats to unlock new possibilities and synergies.

name: My Recycling Center: Container Truck Expansion
description: Start the container skip or dump truck! Load the filled containers with the animated crane and drive them to the waste processing plant. Get through the animated gate to the weigh station and see how much is loaded. Then unload the trash in the designated areas.

name: Stellaris: Rick The Cube Species Portrait
description: An exclusive portrait for you species, to play as the most enigmatic species in the galaxy.

name: Sandwich Sim
description: A game where you play as a slightly confused bear trying to assemble the ultimate meal no matter who tries to get in your way. Relax and fish, visit the grocery store, escape bureaucracy, and more on your way to achieve enlightenment via sandwich.

name: When The World Became Black
description: You play as 07, who wakes up with strange powers in a post-apocalyptic future. Your choice changes the story! Do you become the lost hero? Or do you become something to fear?

name: Thor's Legacy
description: A new type of roguelike deck-builder that's made to be as flexible and customizable as possible, without losing the difficulty that makes it worth pursuing. Survive for as long as you can against an endless wave of enemies, that come back stronger each time you beat them.

name: What Happened to Kate
description: "What happened to Kate" is a gripping puzzle adventure set in a mysteriously silent home. Unravel your coworker's disappearance through challenging puzzles. Delve into the depths of mystery and discover what lies within the quiet.

name: Trap Tower Trials
description: Trap Tower Trials is a 3D single-player platformer that will test your dexterity with various traps and obstacles. This game is designed to be a challenge; therefore, we are not responsible for any peripherals broken in anger. Do you think you'll be able to climb the tower?

name: WattGames
description: Turn your indoor cycling into an adventure! A new revolution in fitness gaming, WATTGAMES is the first-ever indoor cycling game that lets you do battle with fearsome enemies, explore a beautifully crafted world and complete missions through exercise. Ride for your life!

name: I Witness
description: I Witness is a 2-player online co-op psychological horror game that follows a sibling whose curiosity leads them to investigate a neighbor suspected of being a serial killer who, unbeknownst to them, hides a disturbing desire.

name: Moaisland
description: Moaisland is a humorous and surreal, first-person, retro-styled, point-and-click adventure game starring the mysterious Moai statues of Rapa Nui (Easter Island).

name: Sluggerpunk
description: Sluggerpunk is a gripping 2D survivors roguelike adventure. As you navigate through a myriad of challenges, hone your skills and strategies to clash with formidable foes lurking in the underground. Build a versatile arsenal of abilities and gear to enhance your chances to survive, but will you?

name: Rise & Muse
description: "Rise & Muse" is a single-player game that blends RPG, deck-building, and Roguelike elements. Set in the land of Muse, you will engage in strategic battles against formidable enemies, unravel the seal of the male deity, defeat the goddess, and restore world order.

name: PC Futbol 8
description: The wait is over! The legendary Spanish football management video game, PC Fútbol, is back after many years with new dynamics and the classic spirit!

name: The Earth Is Flat
description: Help Teddy on his adventure to prove that the Earth is flat and win back his ex-girlfriend. Venture through various countries such as Canada, the US, Brazil, Ireland, Italy and many others. Face crazy scientists, control a Jet Ski, try to reach the Earth's atmosphere with balloons, and more.

name: Squirrel Knight
description: Jump, slash, and race against the clock in this classic action-platformer. Adventure as Squirrel Knight to save the forest and discover powerful magic, deadly enemies and hidden secrets along the way.

name: The Krilling: Scare Feast!
description: In this funny bayou based game, complete recipes as a cursed shrimp ghost by luring in and scaring unassuming hotel guests. Collect your victims emotions, mess with physics, and unlock new possessables to please the mysterious Gator Ghost and possibly become human again!

name: Sifera
description: Embark on an adventure in Sifera, a world scarred by 'The Cascade.' Explore vast landscapes, uncover secrets, and engage in challenging combat. Your choices shape the fate of the planet in this epic journey.

name: Holosaga: Invasion of the HoloX
description: Liberated from the shackles of power, Laplace led the HoloX members and the army to invade Earth! You must gather the members of the HoloLive and stop them.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Swayfield Branch
description: Hiawathamr Trainz Add-ons presents the Swayfield Branch for Trainz! The Swayfield Branch is a UK themed route set in the Midlands of the United Kingdon. On the southern end of the route is the main line that connects the branch line to the rest of the BR system for both goods and passenger traffic.

name: Trainz Plus: Swayfield Branch
description: Hiawathamr Trainz Add-ons presents the Swayfield Branch for Trainz! The Swayfield Branch is a UK themed route set in the Midlands of the United Kingdon. On the southern end of the route is the main line that connects the branch line to the rest of the BR system for both goods and passenger traffic.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Swayfield Branch
description: Hiawathamr Trainz Add-ons presents the Swayfield Branch for Trainz! The Swayfield Branch is a UK themed route set in the Midlands of the United Kingdon. On the southern end of the route is the main line that connects the branch line to the rest of the BR system for both goods and passenger traffic.

name: Pineapple Defense
description: "Pineapple Defense" is an exciting tower defense game where you defend a pineapple farm from attacks by flies and meme characters. Plant pineapples, build cannons, and battle bosses to save the harvest and become a hero of the farming world!

name: Level Up! Factory
description: Commander! Manage your shelter with survivors in a abandoned nuclear power plant. Search resources to make different types of boxes, send expeditions, repair work areas, face enemies to defend your facilities, deploy drones and rc cars, prepare for special events and more. All in real-time.

name: Storage Looter
description: Storage Looter is a loot game in a Voxel universe. Your goal is to collect the rarest and most profitable items in order to improve your store. From classic recovery to a metal detector, there are many things to do!

name: Tashikani
description: Line up numbers to make 10 in this falling block puzzle game!

name: Boom Lift Operator
description: "Boom Lift Operator" is an immersive training game where players learn to operate boom lifts safely through realistic simulations and challenges.

name: Réussir: Code de la Route - Bonus ASSR 1 - ASSR 2: Permis AM - French Highway Code
description: Sin descripción

name: Wandness
description: Craft wands, create synergies, battle monsters, and survive. Dive into the depths of magic crafting, where you'll forge spells from magical components and elemental gems for endless combinations. Explore procedurally generated dungeons, and unleash your magic madness to overcome the darkness.

name: Quatros Noir
description: Quatros Noir is a fast-paced, fallen blocks, action puzzle game. Stack your blocks in more than one dimension and clear lines along the way. Master the campaign, +20 single modes, local multiplayer and co-op mode.

name: The Aquarians
description: A point-and-click playable short where you take the role of an artifact collector, navigating the Aquarian Temple's enigmatic architecture and locating its prized relics.

name: Pythonmancer
description: Collect dungeon keys, fight enemies in turn-based combat and find several party members so you can escape a tower that has been overrun by deadly creatures.

name: Pixel Town: Akanemachi Sideshow
description: While on vacation on a scenic island, Fuu and her brother find themselves trapped when a magical barrier forms around the island. Now Fuu must unravel the secrets of the island to secure their escape.

name: Tavern Ventures: Guilds & Tales
description: Embark on a journey where your tavern becomes the epicenter of adventure and intrigue. Align with guilds, outwit competition, and navigate a world rich with secrets. Your choices craft the narrative of an enchanting fantasy saga, inviting mystery at every turn.

name: Tattered Sails
description: The Golden Age of Piracy, a time when legends are made or torn down. No trip over the seas is safe and every voyage could be your last. Or... You could find riches, power, and become legend!

name: Ravenwood Academy: A Wizard101 Story
description: Step into the role of an outcast student wizard attending Ravenwood Academy and prepare to discover the truth behind the school’s bizarre events. Create connections, investigate mysteries, and drop in for a spell in this storybook-style life sim where your choices matter.

name: Shipwrecked: Lost Colony
description: Shipwrecked: Lost Colony is an 18th Century city-survival builder set on a tropical isle lost to time. Lead a group of marooned survivors and forge a new beginning in an uncharted land, where dinosaurs are the biggest threat and your strongest allies.

name: Lords Mobile
description: Lords Mobile is an online strategy game that combines the excitement of clanwars

name: Belly Bumpers
description: Use your belly to knockout other players in this 2-8 online and local party game. Eat juicy burgers to increase the size of your belly or force-feed opponents until they burst. Bump it out in a world of food-themed stages.

name: Tresmir Sight
description: Can you find what you're looking for? Or are you at the mercy of Tisik and her followers? Your words matter in this short game of dialogue.

name: Car-Toon Chaos
description: Car-toon Chaos is an action-packed game where high-speed chases and combat converge. Play as a vigilante driver with fully loaded automatic weapons, pursuing criminals by day and evading colossal dinosaurs by night. Playable on both PC and VR.

name: Crossout: Ronin
description: Unique armoured car: “Ronin”;New activatable melee weapon: “Tachi”;New cabin: “Kensei”;Movement parts: “Hermit” (4 pcs.);Hardware: engine “Cheetah”, invisibility module “Chameleon”, generator “Ampere”;Portrait: “Master Miyamoto”;Paint cans: “Rough sand” and “Gladiator's skin”;Early access to new structural parts;1500 in-game...

name: Crossout: Ronin - Deluxe Edition
description: Unique armoured car: “Ronin” (Deluxe edition);New activatable melee weapon: “Tachi”;New cabin: “Kensei”;Movement parts: “Hermit” (4 pcs.);Hardware: engine “Cheetah”, invisibility module “Chameleon”, generator “Ampere”;Unique paint can: “Legend of Ronin”;Portrait: “Master Miyamoto”;Background and logo for profile customization;A set of...

name: Crossout: Ronin - Lite Edition
description: Unique armoured car: “Ronin” (Lite edition);New activatable melee weapon: “Tachi”;New cabin: “Kensei”;Movement parts: “Racing wheel” (4 pcs.);Hardware: invisibility module “Chameleon”;Paint can: “Bluish smoke”;Early access to new structural parts;Maximum number of parts increased to 60.

name: Outlanders: The Keeper's Shanty
description: The arrival of rowdy tourists disrupts the serenity of a group of tropical islands home to the meticulous ecologists Pirate Sisters. As the ambition of the castaways agitates the ecosystem, it's up to its self-proclaimed protectors to take matters into their own hands and restore their home.

name: The Leviathan's Fantasy: Samurai and Onmyoji
description: The nine-tailed fox is a mythical animal in ancient Chinese legends, often used as a symbol of auspiciousness.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Empire State Express No. 999
description: Climb aboard and take the throttle of one of North America's most historic - and fastest - steam locomotives and “highball” the fabulous Empire State Express with New York Central & Hudson River 4-4-0 No. 999, masterfully created for Train Simulator Classic by Machine Rail!

name: Reclamation of Xanthros
description: Reclamation of Xanthros is a unique Tower-Defense Roguelike. Xeno have taken over the planet Xanthros and you must save it by defeating their Matriarche. Battle across a wide range of biomes with a changing assortment of Towers, Upgrades, and Artifacts. Features a unique turret building mechanic.

name: Master of Command: Prussian Glory
description: Step into command during the Seven Years' War with this innovative roguelike historical strategy game.
