Randomly generated campaigns and real-time battles demand challenging tactical decisions. Customize units and upgrade your force in a game that blends historical depth with unique gameplay.

name: Warehouse Bots
description: Take on the role of a warehouse manager overseeing a bustling hub of automated activity. In this immersive simulator, you'll delve into the intricacies of logistics as you control robots, construct efficient road networks, and fine-tune traffic flow to optimize your warehouse operations.

name: BobasQuest
description: Welcome to the exciting world of Bobas Quest, a fun pixel art platformer where you have to make nimble jumps and complete levels using teleportation.

name: Icebound
description: In this first-person driving survival simulator, assume the role of a wilderness firefighter on a mission gone wrong. Drive, explore and survive with your snowcat vehicle in an icy environment with a hostile military faction ever present on your tail.

name: Stellaris: Season 08
description: Stellaris: Season 08 includes "The Machine Age", a new expansion from Paradox Development Studios, "Cosmic Storms", a new mechanical expansion and "The Grand Archive Story Pack"!

name: RoboSquad Revolution: Maverick Supporter Pack
description: Embrace the Maverick spirit with Logan Paul hologram, exclusive weapon wraps, signature emotes, and Maverick Zoran skins in this epic supporter pack!

name: Swords & Crystals: Dragon Hatchling Pet
description: You gain your personal Dragon Hatchling Pet which will follow you around in the game. The pet is an item that will automatilly be recovered upon losing. You can unlock but also dismiss the pet by simply clicking on the item.

name: Musa
description: Fight numerous monsters in exciting battles and obtain them all. Defeat all monsters and obtain all artifacts.

name: Shallow Sea Roaming
description: Find the secret treasure and explore the secrets of this mysterious island You need to use your courage and scientific knowledge to survive on this island,And find a way to leave this island!

name: Revload
description: Revload is a couch Co-op arena shooter party game. Controll one of these cute revolver creatures and blast your friends into oblivion.

name: Soul Surge
description: Soul Surge is a fast-paced roguelite, where speed equals damage. Slide, kick and tear through the seven stages of grief. Evolve your abilities, to confront the root of corruption and emerge victorious?

name: Slap Cats
description: Slap Cats is a party game that supports up to 4 players playing in local. You will control little cats in the world of paper and defeat other players to win

name: Strike Force Heroes: Ninja Class
description: New DLC introducing the Ninja class, and a number of ninja related items!

name: Jam Scrapz Collection: The Minesweeper
description: One private; no guns; just your wits and trusty mine detector. Your mission is to clear a path through the minefields in the Great Desert. In most levels, you will have to find a mine detector to clear the mines, or carefully navigate through the field and avoid triggering any mines.

name: Icarus: Zebra Rescue Mission
description: unlocks the Zebra Rescue Mission, tasking you with locating 5 wild Zebra across the surface for Sinotai and returning them safely. Your reward for completing this mission is the 5 rescued Zebras as new mounts for you to train, equip and ride.

name: Icarus: Pet Companions Pack
description: This pack unlocks 10 new animals that you can have as tamed pets along with unique talent trees to have as companions as you survive on Icarus

name: Killer Vegetable
description: Girl VS Vegetables「crisp and fresh」A horror game aiming to conquer vegetables

name: Sudoku Acres
description: Sudoku Acres is a cozy cross-up of farm building and puzzle solving. Grow your skills and your environment as you complete Sudoku puzzles, acquire animals, and unlock decorations your farm.

name: Fucus
description: A game where you fight against parkours and drones on an endless road in space.

name: Tea Talk
description: "Tea Talk"? Are you a grumpy old man? Or a doormat? Or is there someone else?

name: Werewolf: The Apocalypse - The Book of Hungry Names: Wardens and Furies
description: Wardens and Furies unlocks the options to play as a member of the Black Fury tribe or the Hart Warden tribe, as well as adding new Gifts for the tribes.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Aquatic Adventures
description: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Dive deep with these aquatic themed tables with a unique center playfield kickback mechanic.

name: Escape Room Collection C2: Psychological Horror
description: A collection of escape room games with a psychological horror theme. Intensely scary visually stimulated and cleverly psychologically intrigued as players are both timid and captivated, you'll be locked in a room full of horror atmospheres where you must find clues and solve puzzles to escape.

name: 21 Mayble Drive
description: You find yourself in an abandoned house, consumed by darkness and mysteries. The old walls creak, and the air is filled with the smell of decay and fear.

name: Toxic Place
description: Toxic Place, an exciting story in the form of a soul like game, combined with a sandbox for you to experience adventure. In a world full of pollution and monsters that have been affected have mutated into terrifying creatures. Will you be able to survive this cruel world?

name: Fearful Injection
description: Find anomalies, talk to ghosts and survive the night.

name: DeSoloFender
description: a tower defense game in a 3D environment. Unique interface design and damage system which significantly increases the strategy factor. With a choice of 4 different weapons and a lot of improvement options, this game is perfect for putting your strategic skills to the test.

name: Protocol Five
description: Protocol Filve is a surreal first-person adventure with multiple endings, you will find yourself in a world where some rotten things want to kill you. Some choices along the way drastically and irreversibly change the game, leading to one of the 5 possible endings.

name: Wealth Project
description: Practice mindfulness! Divide assets and liabilities! Calculate your net worth and how much time it takes to reach your dreams! Set a clear vision and goals to create your own wealth project!

name: Brains n' Bullets
description: Brains n' Bullets is the first shooter that lets you improve your school grades while playing. Learn vocabulary and other content by heart while you and your team fight to conquer the bases on tactical maps.

name: GuardFortressVR
description: Due to racial differences, battles often break out, and you, as the new king of mankind, are determined to unite the continents and rid the world of war. But only if you accept races from other continents. From then on began the journey of unifying the continent!

name: Cosmic Breakout
description: In this breakout-inspired game you engage in a hefty arcade battle: Move with your little board against the dark polygon-forces of the world.

name: Ronin Rush
description: Drawing inspiration from classic Hack & Slash, Beat ‘em Up, and SHMUP genres, we introduce our unique "Slice ‘em Up" adventure unfolding in fabled Japan! Navigate this Yokai-infested world utilizing a variety of tools, such as kunai, weapon arts, spirit abilities, and of course, the iconic katana!

name: Deathless Death
description: Deathless Death is a narrative puzzle game with psychological thriller elements. You play as a priest navigating a world of thoughts and illusions, tasked with listening to the confessions of four sinners. Through their stories, you uncover hidden truths about their pasts and unravel the complex fates that connect them, all centered around one mysterious woman.

name: Home Renovator
description: Embark on your interior design journey in Home Renovator! Transform houses, unlock tools, and fulfill your client’s needs to build your dream home.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Illustrations 2
description: Puzzles of beautiful Illustrations!

name: Two Bad Fellas
description: In this first person, horror, casual game, you have to protect your Teddy from the Two Bad Fellas. Find quickly a safe spot to hide your buddy and than move him to the next one. Explore the house and solve riddles but be aware, if you hold your Teddy for too long, you will be in big danger!

name: PortalBox
description: This game introduces portals to the classic box-pushing game! With the addition of portals, problems that were impossible in the ordinary box-pushing game become possible. Let’s explore this wonderful box-pushing game together!

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 3 - Episode 02
description: Season 3 Episode 2: Legend of the Ten Dings! In an attempt to turn Daniel Average, Peter and Peggy find themselves fantasy role-playing in Saltamander-Pinte.

name: Mist
description: Short atmospheric first person horror game with elements of quest and shooter about being lost in the middle of nowhere, surrounded by weird mist.
